name: General Tso Tofu
description: If you're a fan of Chinese food, you will love this general tso tofu. We can't get enough of these crispy baked tofu cubes tossed in a spicy, sweet and sour sauce. Ready in just 30 minutes!
recipeIngredient: 14 oz very firm or extra-firm tofu
green onions, freshly chopped, to sprinkle

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 350 °F. Cut the tofu into cubes. Add two tablespoons of corn starch.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat your oven to 350 °F. Cut the tofu into cubes. Add two tablespoons of corn starch.

recipeInstructions.text: Make sure all cubes are covered in corn starch.
recipeInstructions.name: Make sure all cubes are covered in corn starch.

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and place the tofu cubes on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and place the tofu cubes on top.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the sauce: Place all of the ingredients into a sauce pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the sauce: Place all of the ingredients into a sauce pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook for 3-4 minutes on medium heat until the sauce becomes thick and sticky.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook for 3-4 minutes on medium heat until the sauce becomes thick and sticky.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir well. Serve over brown rice. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and freshly chopped green onion. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Stir well. Serve over brown rice. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and freshly chopped green onion. Enjoy!
